meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive David Clemmons Alan Lin Austin Rogers Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7628.

td.p: David Clemmons, an 11th grade U.S. history teacher in Keller, Texas from Fort Worth, Texas
Alan Lin, a software engineer from Riverside, California
Austin Rogers, a bartender from New York, New York

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Putin

Alan
')

tr.td: "R" you ready?! The brightest star in Orion, this is set to go super-nova! (But relax, only within 10 mil. years or so)

')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_6_5', 'clue_DJ_6_5_stuck', 'Boy: "Dad, I\'ll be good if you give me a dollar." Father: "A dollar?! When I was your age I was" this')

tr.td: Boy: "Dad, I'll be good if you give me a dollar." Father: "A dollar?! When I was your age I was" this

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
DavidWho is Longfellow
$1,400
AustinWho was Lord Byron?
$8,000
AlanWho is Lord Byron
$5
Lord Byron')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In 1824 he was refused burial in Westminster Abbey for "questionable morality"; in 1969 he got a memorial stone there')

tr.td: In 1824 he was refused burial in Westminster Abbey for "questionable morality"; in 1969 he got a memorial stone there
